meanings.sent1: The leashed dog happily wagged its tail.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the pet is always leashed during walks.
meanings.sent3: The leashed puppy tried to chase a butterfly but couldn't reach.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was leashed by the reality of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The colorful leash leashed the energetic dog securely.

meanings.definition: Restrained or controlled with a leash.
meanings.sent1: The leashed cat calmly explored the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The leashed horse trotted obediently beside its owner.
meanings.sent3: The leashed squirrel attempted a daring escape but failed.
meanings.sent4: His temper was leashed by her calming presence.
meanings.sent5: The leashed balloon floated gently in the breeze.
